comments: Champion's winnings & consolation amounts matched to Be The Match.

clues.clue: In 1876 the Centennial Exposition opened in Philadelphia & this "Centennial State" joined the Union

After an expedition was sent to subdue Native Americans led by Sitting Bull & Crazy Horse, this battle ensued on June 25

Alexander Graham Bell beat this rival by just a few hours in filing a patent for the telephone

This pair of "larger" & "smaller" islands are in a group about 100 miles off the east coast of Spain

final_jeopardy.clue: The code name for a historic meeting at this city was Argonaut, after the heroes who searched for the Golden Fleece on the Black Sea
